android.car.drivingstate

类 CarUxRestrictionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.CarManagerBase
      • android.car.drivingstate.CarUxRestrictionsManager

  • public final class CarUxRestrictionsManager
extends CarManagerBase
    API to register and get the User Experience restrictions imposed based on the car's driving state.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  CarUxRestrictionsManager.OnUxRestrictionsChangedListener
      Listener Interface for clients to implement to get updated on driving state related changes.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String UX_RESTRICTION_MODE_BASELINE
      Baseline restriction mode is the default UX restrictions used for driving state.

      • UX_RESTRICTION_MODE_BASELINE

        public static final java.lang.String UX_RESTRICTION_MODE_BASELINE
        Baseline restriction mode is the default UX restrictions used for driving state.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCarDisconnected

        public void onCarDisconnected()
        从类复制的说明: CarManagerBase
        Handle disconnection of car service (=crash). As car service has crashed already, this call should only clean up any listeners / callbacks passed from client. Clearing object passed to car service is not necessary as car service has crashed. Note that Car*Manager will not work any more as all binders are invalid. Client should re-create all Car*Managers when car service is restarted.
        指定者:
        onCarDisconnected 在类中 CarManagerBase

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(CarUxRestrictionsManager.OnUxRestrictionsChangedListener listener)
        Registers a CarUxRestrictionsManager.OnUxRestrictionsChangedListener for listening to changes in the UX Restrictions to adhere to.

        If a listener has already been registered, it has to be unregistered before registering the new one.

        参数:
        listener - CarUxRestrictionsManager.OnUxRestrictionsChangedListener

      • registerListener

        @Deprecated
public void registerListener(CarUxRestrictionsManager.OnUxRestrictionsChangedListener listener,
                                          int displayId)
        已过时。

                        CarUxRestrictionsManager.OnUxRestrictionsChangedListener listener)

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener()

      • saveUxRestrictionsConfigurationForNextBoot

        public boolean saveUxRestrictionsConfigurationForNextBoot(java.util.List<CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration> configs)
        Sets new CarUxRestrictionsConfigurations for next trip.

        Saving new configurations does not affect current configuration. The new configuration will only be used after UX Restrictions service restarts when the vehicle is parked.

        Input configurations must be one-to-one mapped to displays, namely each display must have exactly one configuration. See CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder#setDisplayAddress(DisplayAddress).

        参数:
        configs - Map of display Id to UX restrictions configurations to be persisted.
        返回:
        true if input config was successfully saved; false otherwise.

      • getCurrentCarUxRestrictions

        public CarUxRestrictions getCurrentCarUxRestrictions()
        Gets the current UX restrictions (CarUxRestrictions) in place.
        返回:
        current UX restrictions that is in effect.

      • getCurrentCarUxRestrictions

        public CarUxRestrictions getCurrentCarUxRestrictions(int displayId)

      • setRestrictionMode

        public boolean setRestrictionMode(java.lang.String mode)
        Sets restriction mode. Returns true if the operation succeeds.

        The default mode is UX_RESTRICTION_MODE_BASELINE.

        If a new CarUxRestrictions is available upon mode transition, it'll be immediately dispatched to listeners.

        If the given mode is not configured for current driving state, it will fall back to the default value.

        If a configuration was set for a passenger mode before an upgrade to Android R, that passenger configuration is now called "passenger".

      • getRestrictionMode

        public java.lang.String getRestrictionMode()
        Returns the current restriction mode.

        The default mode is UX_RESTRICTION_MODE_BASELINE.

        If a configuration was set for a passenger mode before an upgrade to Android R, that passenger configuration is now called "passenger".

      • saveUxRestrictionsConfigurationForNextBoot

        public boolean saveUxRestrictionsConfigurationForNextBoot(CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration config)
        Sets a new CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration for next trip.

        Saving a new configuration does not affect current configuration. The new configuration will only be used after UX Restrictions service restarts when the vehicle is parked.

        参数:
        config - UX restrictions configuration to be persisted.
        返回:
        true if input config was successfully saved; false otherwise.

      • getStagedConfigs

        public java.util.List<CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration> getStagedConfigs()
        Gets the staged configurations.

        Configurations set by saveUxRestrictionsConfigurationForNextBoot(List) do not immediately affect current drive. Instead, they are staged to take effect when car service boots up the next time.

        This methods is only for test purpose, please do not use in production.

        返回:
        current staged configuration, null if it's not available

      • getConfigs

        public java.util.List<CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration> getConfigs()
        Gets the current configurations.
        返回:
        current configurations that is in effect.
